title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Strengthening Language Skills for Scientific Communication in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Improvement in the ability to accurately interpret digital scientific content (graphs, infographics, etc.).

Learners structure scientific information required by public institutions into three core messages (problem, solution, effect) and create a 10–15-minute digital presentation including at least two visual aids (infographics, charts, etc.). The final output must achieve an average score of 4 or higher on a 5-point peer evaluation scale.
Strengthening competencies in searching for and evaluating scientific information using academic databases and digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
